snippet: Boston Red Sox General Manager Ben Cherington said that the outfield prospect Bryce Brentz accidentally shot himself in the leg last month but could recover in time to play in spring training.
abstract: Boston Red Sox outfield prospect Bryce Brentz accidentally shoots himself in leg; other MLB developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox General Manager Ben Cherington said that the outfield prospect Bryce Brentz accidentally shot himself in the leg last month but could recover in time to play in spring training.

headline.seo: Red Sox Prospect Bryce Brentz Accidentally Shot Himself
headline.main: Red Sox Outfield Prospect Shoots Himself
